column2: (ED:CEF) Forge a new Empire by combining Kingdoms
As a great King, we can declare a new empire, distinct from all those that came before.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] completely controls [Root.GetHerHis] primary title: the §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has at least 3 kingdom titles which [Root.GetSheHe] completely controls
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] completely controls the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!

§L...INFO: For the purpose of this decision, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] §Y'completely controls'§L a kingdom if all of its de jure counties and duchies: are owned by [Root.GetHerHim] personally, or are owned by one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals, or don't exist. In other words, foreign-owned baronies (eg. from holy orders) will not block you from taking this decision.§!
Every county and duchy in §Y[This.GetName]§! is owned by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals)
§R!!!DEBUG MODE!!!§! No limit on [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm size!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm size is less than 120 (excluding vassal MR family palaces)
§L...INFO: The piety cost is based on §Y3§L kingdoms being merged§!
§L...INFO: The piety cost is based on §Y4§L kingdoms being merged§!
§L...INFO: The piety cost is based on §Y5§L kingdoms being merged§!
§L...INFO: The piety cost is based on §Y6§L kingdoms being merged§!
§L...INFO: The piety cost is based on §Y7§L kingdoms being merged§!
§L...INFO: The piety cost is based on §Y8 or more§L kingdoms being merged§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will form a new empire by merging [Root.GetHerHis] completely-controlled kingdoms.
The new empire's §Yname§! will be copied from [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title: §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
The new empire's §Ylaws§! will be copied from [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title: §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
The new empire's §Ycoat of arms§! and §Ymap colour§! will be based on this title
The new empire's §Ycoat of arms§! and §Ymap colour§! will be based on [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s primary title: §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
§L...INFO: If you wish, you can use any realm title as the basis for the §Ycoat of arms§L and §Ymap colour§L , by right-clicking on it and manually flagging it §YBEFORE§L taking this decision.§!

§L...§RWARNING!§L The new empire's exact §Ymap colour§L will be slightly but unpredictably different to that of the base title - and the actual colour can sometimes be VERY ugly! You should probably §Rsave your game§L and §Rbackup your save§L before taking this decision!§!
Becomes de jure part of the new empire, and is then destroyed.
§Y[This.GetName]§!: Becomes the traditional capital province of the new empire.
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
§M(ED:CEF)§! Use as Base Title
Use this title as the §Y'Base Title'§! when forging a new empire
§M(ED:CEF)§! Stop using as Base Title
Stop using this title as the §Y'Base Title'§! when forging a new empire

column1: # Empire formation targetted title decision tooltips

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] can take the §Y'Forge a new Empire by combining Kingdoms'§! decision
The §Y[This.GetFullName]§! is personally held by [From.GetTitledFirstName]
The §Y[This.GetFullName]§! is held by one of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s vassals
The §Y[This.GetFullName]§! has no holder, and is a §Yde jure vassal§! of a title held by [From.GetTitledFirstName]
The §Y[This.GetFullName]§! will be used to set the §Ycoat of arms§! and §Ymap colour§! for the §Y'Forge a new Empire by combining Kingdoms'§! decision
The §Y[This.GetFullName]§! will §RNOT§! be used to set the §Ycoat of arms§! and §Ymap colour§! for the §Y'Forge a new Empire by combining Kingdoms'§! decision
